overview:
A graduate of Howard University School of Law, Martye Kendrick is a real estate, corporate and tax law attorney practicing in the greater Denver area. She is currently the principal partner at Kendrick & Associates. Previously, Ms. Kendrick practiced law as a corporate business and taxation attorney with Riggs, Abney, Neal, Turpen, Orbison & Lewis in Denver, Colorado.

On an interim basis, Ms. Kendrick provides legal oversight and review to The Lombard Company, Inc. and Lovetropolis.com in contractual matters and legal advice on corporate conduct.
